about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Certified Sworn Translator
about.description:
I am a sworn translator of English and Ukrainian with over 10 years of experience. Registered on the list of sworn translators maintained by the Minister of Justice.

I specialize in translations of official documents, civil status certificates, educational and legal documents. I guarantee the highest quality of translations and timely execution of orders.

I have professional liability insurance and all necessary qualifications to practice as a sworn translator.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch
contact.name: Anna Kowalska
contact.position: Sworn Translator of English and Ukrainian
contact.description: Feel free to contact me for a detailed quote or to answer any questions. Documents can be sent by email or messengers.

items.question: What is a sworn translation?
items.answer: A sworn translation is a translation performed by a translator registered on the list of sworn translators maintained by the Minister of Justice. Such translation has legal force and is stamped and signed by the translator.

items.question: How long does translation take?
items.answer: Standard delivery time is 2-3 business days. For urgent orders, express service (24h) is available for an additional fee.

items.question: What documents are needed?
items.answer: Simply send a scan or photo of the document by email, WhatsApp or other messenger. For some documents, I may need to see the original.

items.question: How to send documents?
items.answer: Documents can be sent by email to kontakt@tlumaczenieprzysiegle24.pl or via WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber. I accept scans and good quality photos.

items.question: What payment methods are available?
items.answer: I accept bank transfers, BLIK payments and cash for personal pickup.

items.question: How will I receive the translated document?
items.answer: The finished translation can be sent by post, courier or picked up in person. It is also possible to send a scan by email before receiving the original.

items.question: What is an apostille?
items.answer: An apostille is a special certification that allows a document to be recognized in countries that are parties to the Hague Convention. It authenticates the signature and seal on the document.

items.question: Do you also translate business documents?
items.answer: Yes, I also translate business documents, contracts, accounting documents and other business documents.
